author: scottbw
msg: Removed "-incubating" from artefact names, and updated POM templates with correct developer info and new URLs and email addresses

author: rhuijben
msg: Since file moves now start introducing 'update induced' conflicts on WORKING
nodes the assumption that the location can be read from BASE is no longer
valid. So start recording the full repository location in the conflict skel.
This avoid something the update_move handling calls the 'scan dance'.
(setup_tree_conflict_desc): Assume the location is there, or a legacy (1.7)

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-4855: Port 1430291 from trunk to 10.7 branch.

author: jim
msg: ab: add the possibility to define a socket timeout (-s timeout)
- reword -t option to be more clear with the new -s
- reword some options to better match online documentation
ab.xml claimed that -s was already there, but nothing in the code looks like that.
So, I guess it only landed on the online doc...
